messages.message: WARN: /toc.xhtml: HTML5 DOCTYPE definition within ePub v2.
ERROR: /OPS/content.opf(7): Error while parsing file 'attribute "property" not allowed here; expected attribute "content", "id", "name", "scheme" or "xml:lang"'.
ERROR: /OPS/content.opf(7): Error while parsing file 'element "meta" missing required attributes "content" and "name"'.
ERROR: /OPS/content.opf(7): Error while parsing file 'text not allowed here; expected the element end-tag'.

ERROR: /OPS/content.opf(12): Error while parsing file 'attribute "properties" not allowed here; expected attribute "fallback", "fallback-style", "href", "media-type", "required-modules" or "required-namespace"'.
ERROR: /OPS/toc.xhtml: The nav file is not supported for ePub v2.
